articles.title: Singtel buys minority stake in Indonesian bank for about S$48 million - CNA
articles.description: SINGAPORE: Singapore Telecommunications, Southeast Asia's largest telecommunications operator, said on Friday (Jan 21) it has bought a 16.3 per cent stake in PT Bank Fama International for 500 billion rupiah (S$48.0 million) to pursue banking opportunities in…

articles.title: 4 common scams in Singapore and how to recognise them - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Scams are on the rise. Nearly 470 OCBC Bank customers lost at least $8.5 million to a spate of SMS phishing scams last month, and other banks such as DBS and UOB recently warned of similar scams impersonating bank employees. Here are some of the m…
